mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(IFNULL(log.login_total, 0)) + 1 AS loginTotal FROM `t_login_log` log WHERE log.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY log.login_total DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT login_log.login_time AS loginTime, login_log.login_ip AS loginIp, u.username FROM t_login_log login_log INNER JOIN t_user u ON login_log.user_id = u.id WHERE (1 = 1)
AND (u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyWord},'%') OR login_log.login_ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyWord},'%'))
ORDER BY login_log.login_time DESC
SELECT u.username, MAX(login_log.login_total) AS loginTotal FROM t_login_log login_log INNER JOIN t_user u ON login_log.user_id = u.id WHERE (1 = 1) GROUP BY u.id
